attributes.action: Create a peerage for Richard Dawkins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Richard Dawkins is a person who has done great work to make atheism acceptable in society both at home and abroad.  He speaks with great intelligence and is a natural orator.  He should represent the people of the United Kingdom who do not believe in an imaginary friend.  There are Atheists in both Houses who are afraid of declaring a non belief as it would lose them votes, but he would stand up for common sense.

Any religious leader who believes in an imaginary god, or a God that is not relevant in today’s society, should not be a given a seat in the House of Lords as a right.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
